timeline.message:
Address review comments in PR 757

Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma <apekshit.sharma@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer this be modeled as an Instant to make it easier for the user to configure and to avoid having to convert it to instant repeatedly in Utility.verifyHashChain(). Unix timestamps are pretty common but nanosecond unix timestamps less so. Plus it's harder to tell the time without conversion. I tested it locally and it's already supported by Spring with a value like 2007-12-03T10:15:30.123456789Z in your application.yaml.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Unresolving. It looks like you're missing a commit to address this or at least a comment?
replies.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: yeah, missed it. Thanks for noticing. Done.
replies.author: apeksharma
